mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrDlvsp Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MBR_NO , DLV_ADBUK_TURN , ADBUK_NM , ADDRSE_NM , BASE_DLVSP_YN , DLV_ADDR_SECT_CD , NATION_CD , POST_NO , BASE_ADDR , DETAIL_ADDR , CTY_NM , LCLTY_NM , TEL_NATION_NO , TEL_AREA_NO , TEL_TLOF_NO , TEL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , MOBIL_NATION_NO , MOBIL_AREA_NO , MOBIL_TLOF_NO , MOBIL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , DLV_EMAIL , DLV_RM , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_DLVSP WHERE 1 = 1 AND MBR_NO = #{mbrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DLV_ADBUK_TURN = #{dlvAdbukTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
